title: If I need to buy a phone now, should I wait to buy the new Apple iPhone 11? - Quora
tags: Advice About Apple Products and Services

response.answer_text: If you can wait, then wait. But if you need it now, you are going to have to buy it now. I don’t know of a plan where you can get next year’s unannounced models now, just because you happen to need it now, unless you can get a job working for Apple.
Just watch this: New products for smarter people.
